thread.section_title: ArcataPet.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ArcataPet.com | www.arcatapet.com
thread.title: Prisca

author: Prisca
title: Prisca
text:
I bought the divider for our geckos, and not only the offering experience was quick and easy, but the product was shipped immediately.
This pet divider was made for aquariums, to divide fish, but we bought it for our geckos, and it works perfectly in our 10 gallon terrarium. We had to modify the top with some chopsticks and aluminum foil, because unlike fish, our geckos did climb over it... üòÅüêäüêä I wish you had one made for reptiles, but this works. Thank you!
